data.comment: The big names in today's match at London Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
In the minute 3, Trezeguet of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 6, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Aston Villa.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 12, West Ham are coming forward and Michail Antonio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Michael Oliver signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
In the minute 14, Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Aston Villa to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Aston Villa push forward at London Stadium and Mbwana Samatta gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the West Ham defence.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
In London Aston Villa's Mbwana Samatta is caught offside.
In London Aston Villa attack through John McGinn. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 17, West Ham have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Aston Villa.
West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
West Ham are pushing forward but Declan Rice's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
Michael Oliver signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
In the minute 23, Michail Antonio (West Ham) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 29, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick West Ham.
In the minute 33, Declan Rice of West Ham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Michael Oliver awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Aston Villa.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 36, Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham.
Mbwana Samatta is booked for the away team.
In the minute 42, Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Aston Villa in London.
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish gets in a shot on goal at London Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
In the minute 45, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick West Ham.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at London Stadium.
West Ham make their second substitution with Sebastian Haller replacing Michail Antonio.
In the minute 45, The home team replace Jarrod Bowen with Andriy Yarmolenko.
The second-half is underway in London.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for West Ham, close to Aston Villa's area.
In the minute 50, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
Aston Villa's Mbwana Samatta attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 51, Michael Oliver awards West Ham a goal kick.
At London Stadium, Ryan Fredericks has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 53, Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aston Villa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from West Ham.
In the minute 61, West Ham's Andriy Yarmolenko misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Throw-in West Ham.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
Aston Villa push forward at London Stadium and Frederic Guilbert gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Aston Villa.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Manuel Lanzini is on a sub for Pablo Fornals for West Ham.
In the minute 68, Keinan Davis is replacing Mbwana Samatta for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
Sebastian Haller (West Ham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In the minute 76, West Ham are pushing forward but Declan Rice's finish is wide of the goal.
Michael Oliver awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Aston Villa make their third substitution with Marvelous Nakamba replacing Conor Hourihane.
Kortney Hause is replacing Frederic Guilbert for the away team.
In the minute 77, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Jack Grealish (Aston Villa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 79, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for West Ham!
In the minute 81, In London, Manuel Lanzini of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Aston Villa are coming forward and Keinan Davis gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 83, Michael Oliver signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Goal! Jack Grealish gives Aston Villa a 0-1 lead.
Great play from John McGinn to set up the goal.
In the minute 85, Andriy Yarmolenko grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at London Stadium.
Declan Rice instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Mark Noble with Felipe Anderson. This is the fourth substitution made today by David Moyes.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in London.
Throw-in West Ham.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Michael Oliver blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Anwar El Ghazi is on a sub for Trezeguet for Aston Villa.
